User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the DocuPilot application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity.

Document.title: Document
Document.description: Represents a document uploaded or created by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the document entity.

uploadDate.description: Date and time when the document was uploaded.

Chunk.title: Chunk
Chunk.description: Represents a chunk of text extracted from a document.

id.description: Unique identifier for the chunk entity.

embedding.description: Vector embedding of the chunk's content for semantic search.

Conversation.title: Conversation
Conversation.description: Represents a conversation between the user and the DocuPilot application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the conversation entity.

startTime.description: Date and time when the conversation started.

ChatMessage.title: ChatMessage
ChatMessage.description: Represents a message within a conversation.

id.description: Unique identifier for the chat message entity.

timestamp.description: Date and time when the message was sent.

Task.title: Task
Task.description: Represents a task created by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the task entity.

dueDate.description: Date when the task is due.

completed.description: Indicates whether the task is completed.

definition.description: Stores user profiles. Documents in this collection are private to the user. 'userId' is the Firebase Auth UID.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase Auth UID of the user.

definition.description: Stores documents uploaded by a user. Documents are private to the user. Includes denormalized 'userId' for authorization independence.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase Auth UID of the user.

params.name: documentId
params.description: The unique identifier of the document.

definition.description: Stores chunks of text extracted from a document. Chunks are private to the user who uploaded the document. Includes denormalized 'userId' for authorization independence.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase Auth UID of the user.

params.name: documentId
params.description: The unique identifier of the document.

params.name: chunkId
params.description: The unique identifier of the chunk.

definition.description: Stores conversations between a user and the application. Conversations are private to the user. Includes denormalized 'userId' for authorization independence.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase Auth UID of the user.

params.name: conversationId
params.description: The unique identifier of the conversation.

definition.description: Stores messages within a conversation. Messages are private to the user who owns the conversation. Includes denormalized 'userId' for authorization independence.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase Auth UID of the user.

params.name: conversationId
params.description: The unique identifier of the conversation.

params.name: messageId
params.description: The unique identifier of the message.

definition.description: Stores tasks created by a user. Tasks are private to the user. Includes denormalized 'userId' for authorization independence.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase Auth UID of the user.

params.name: taskId
params.description: The unique identifier of the task.
